properties.name: app.file-tracker.store-path
properties.description: Location where files generated will be stored

properties.name: app.file-tracker.max-errors-per-hour
properties.description: Max number of errors allowed per hour before rejecting generation of same file type

properties.name: app.file-tracker.purge-cron-exp
properties.description: Cron expression to purge old files

properties.name: app.file-tracker.retention-months
properties.description: Number of months to keep older files
